TopicTitle: How to get my Kerbals back?

Articles.Content:
In Career mode, I've already sent 4 Kerbals on mission, whom 3 Bob, Jebediah and Bill, the one I like so much, they survived the launch, and are staying in command pod in different places on Kerbin, how to send them back to base? I don't want to kill them. And I see no option "end flight".

Oh sorry, my fault, it's recover vessel, I got it. Sorry for bothering.
